Summary._: URGENT TRACK REPAIRS  Jun 20 - 21, Wed and Thu, 945 AM to 330 PM [4] Woodlawn-bound trains skip Bedford Pk Blvd

Description._: URGENT TRACK REPAIRS  Jun 20 - 21, Wed and Thu, 945 AM to 330 PM [4] Woodlawn-bound trains skip Bedford Pk Blvd

LongDescription:
URGENT TRACK REPAIRS | Jun 20 - 21, Wed and Thu, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
[4] Woodlawn-bound trains skip Bedford Pk Blvd


For service to this station, take the [4] to Mosholu Pkwy and transfer to a Crown Hts-bound [4].

For service from this station, take the [4] to Kingsbridge Rd and transfer to a Woodlawn-bound [4].

LongDescription:
URGENT TRACK REPAIRS | Wednesday, Jun 20, 10:15 AM to 3:30 PM
[7] Flushing-bound trains skip 33, 40, 46, 52, 69, 74, 82, 90, 103 and 111 Sts


For service to these stations, take the [7] to 61 St-Woodside, Junction Blvd or Willets Point and transfer to a Hudson Yards-bound [7].

For service from these stations, take the [7] to Junction Blvd, 61 St-Woodside or Queensboro Plaza and transfer to a Flushing-bound [7].

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

LongDescription:
STATION ENHANCEMENTS | Jun 20 - 21, Wed and Thu, 10:15 AM to 3:30 PM
Manhattan-bound [N] [W] trains skip Broadway and 39 Av in Queens


For service to these stations, take the [N] or [W] to Queensboro Plaza and transfer to an
Astoria-bound [N] or [W].

For service from these stations, take the [N] or [W] to Astoria Blvd and transfer to a
Manhattan-bound [N] or [W].

Note: 30 Av and 36 Av are closed for renovation.
